item.title: Raspberry Saison
item.author: luketryan95@gmail.com (Luke Ryan)
item.description: https://www.brewersfriend.com/homebrew/recipe/view/931308/raspberry-saison Grain Bill -Base is pilsner, Vienna and Wheat malt to add body, head and character with a slight maltiness from the Vienna. Acidulated malt to lower mash pH. Hops -Bittering hops to give approximately 30 IBUs and add spicy and fruity notes. -Kent Goldings, Saaz, or Willamette to add mild floral/herbal notes without overpowering the fruit. Water Chemistry Calcium: 50 Magnesium: 5 Sodium: 20 Chloride: 30 Sulfate: 100 -Higher sulfates will give aid in drying out the beer and accentuating the hops/fruit.
